YearsCodePro.definition: NOT including education, how many years have you coded professionally (as a part of your work)?

DevType.definition: Which of the following describe you?

options.data_scientist: Data scientist or machine learning specialist
options.machine_learning_specialist: Data scientist or machine learning specialist

EdLevel.definition: Which of the following best describes the highest level of formal education that you’ve completed?

options.none: I never completed any formal education
options.masters: Master’s degree (M.A., M.S., M.Eng., MBA, etc.)
options.secondary: Secondary school (e.g. American high school, German Realschule or Gymnasium, etc.)
options.some: Some college/university study without earning a degree

OpSys.definition: What is the primary operating system in which you work?
